Question
========
What is the average grade for the exam "introduction in economics" (variable: introduction_economics) for the students who got a failing grade (score lower than 5.5) on the exam of macro_economics (variable macro_economics) and who had a score of 1 on proposition 2 (variable: proposition2)? Write your answer in the answer box (with 3 decimal places).

* Download**: [SPSS file](eur-descriptive-221-nl-data.sav), [CSV file](eur-descriptive-221-nl-data.csv)


Solution
========
The correct answer is 3,599.
